## How to configure this issue
- [ ] **Labeled with Team** (`appointments`)
- [ ] **Labeled with Practice Area** (`backend`, `frontend`, `design`, `product`)
- [ ] **Labeled with** `bug`
- [ ] **Assigned to** Product for prioritization
